survey_name: Corporate Carbon Footprint Reduction Initiatives Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their awareness, participation, and suggestions for improving corporate carbon footprint reduction initiatives.

questions.question_text: How aware are you of your company's carbon footprint reduction initiatives?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple 4-point scale to measure awareness.

script.question_text: How aware are you of your company's carbon footprint reduction initiatives?

questions.question_text: Which of the following carbon reduction initiatives are you currently participating in? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Energy-saving measures (e.g., turning off lights, using energy-efficient appliances)
Sustainable commuting options (e.g., biking, public transport)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to capture participation in various initiatives.

script.question_text: Which of the following carbon reduction initiatives are you currently participating in? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Energy-saving measures (e.g., turning off lights, using energy-efficient appliances)
Sustainable commuting options (e.g., biking, public transport)

questions.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in the previous question, please specify the carbon reduction initiative you participate in.
questions.routing_logic: Only if 'Other' is selected in Q2
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture unique initiatives not listed.

script.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in the previous question, please specify the carbon reduction initiative you participate in.
script.routing_logic: Only if 'Other' is selected in Q2

questions.question_text: How effective do you think your company's carbon reduction initiatives are?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple 5-point scale to gauge perceived effectiveness.

script.question_text: How effective do you think your company's carbon reduction initiatives are?

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from participating in carbon reduction initiatives? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of awareness about the initiatives
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to identify common barriers.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from participating in carbon reduction initiatives? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Lack of awareness about the initiatives

questions.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in the previous question, please specify the barrier preventing your participation.
questions.routing_logic: Only if 'Other' is selected in Q5
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to capture unique barriers not listed.

script.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in the previous question, please specify the barrier preventing your participation.
script.routing_logic: Only if 'Other' is selected in Q5

questions.question_text: What additional carbon reduction initiatives would you like to see your company implement?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather innovative ideas from employees.

script.question_text: What additional carbon reduction initiatives would you like to see your company implement?

questions.question_text: How important is it for your company to prioritize carbon footprint reduction?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple 4-point scale to measure importance.

script.question_text: How important is it for your company to prioritize carbon footprint reduction?

questions.question_text: Would you be interested in participating in future carbon reduction initiatives if more options were available?
questions.client_notes: Use a simple 4-point scale to gauge interest.

script.question_text: Would you be interested in participating in future carbon reduction initiatives if more options were available?

questions.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions regarding your company's carbon footprint reduction efforts?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to allow for any final thoughts or suggestions.

script.question_text: Do you have any additional comments or suggestions regarding your company's carbon footprint reduction efforts?
